name: vscode-quick-lint-js-lsp
description: Find JavaScript bugs with quick-lint-js (Visual Studio Code extension)

quick-lint-js.executablePath.description:
Path to the quick-lint-js executable.

If empty, "quick-lint-js" or "quick-lint-js.exe" is searched for according to the PATH environment variable.

quick-lint-js.trace.server.description: Log messages between VS Code and quick-lint-js.
